oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plaza from North end -- Mound Bottom
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A black-and-white photgraph of the Mound Bottom temple mound, taken from beyond the plaza area.
The photograph gives a sense of the point-of-view of Native Americans observing ceremonies performed on the temple mound.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ethnology - America; Mississippian Culture - Southern States; Architecture - North America; Indians of North America - Antiquities
Archaeological sites; Earthworks (Archaeology); Excavation sites; Photographs
